text: Cows is a surreal sitcom produced by Eddie Izzard for Channel 4 in 1997, where all actors appeared in cow suits. Only the pilot episode was produced by Channel 4 and the show never went into series production. It was written by Nick Whitby and Izzard, and starred Pam Ferris and James Fleet. It was produced by David Tyler. == See also == * Eddie Izzard *Cows (TV pilot) == References == * http://www.auntiemomo.com/cakeordeath/themannew.html * https://us.imdb.com/title/tt0189449/#comment Category:Channel 4 sitcoms
title: Cows (TV series)
